tool_description: Fetch sceneries and getaways in Kenya.
name: Magical Taske
title: Magical Taske

api_list.name: Fetch details of multiple records
api_list.description:
This endpoint fetches details of more than 1 record. Make sure you pass a valid record ids. If you pass in an invalid id, you will get an `Internal Sever Error 500` for the whole request.

You can request details of a maximum of 10 records at a go in this endpoint. The `id`s should be separated using a comma with no spaces.

api_list.name: Fetch by type and region
api_list.description: You can make a request finer by combining region and type. This endpoint will return the records requested. You have to provide a limit of the number of records you want.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type of record you want. Refer to README above to see accepted types.

api_list.name: Fetch by region
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches records by region as defined in the `ABOUT` section above. You have to provide region and a limit of the number of records returned.

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: Type of record you want. Refer to README above to see accepted types.

api_list.name: Fetch by type
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches records by type as defined in `ABOUT` section above. You have to provide type and a limit of the number of records returned.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type of record you want. Refer to README above to see accepted types.
